item.title: Waron - Physical Description
item.description: Appearance [Armor ON] Waron sports a full body set of armor. Covering every spec of ‚Äúflesh‚Äù save for his eyes glowing through the slits in his helm. Appearance under the armor [Armor OFF] I want Waron to look as though he‚Äôs been mauled by something to a viscous degree.
